leitej.net

Interface ConnectionClientItf

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DtpClient

    public interface ConnectionClientItf
    Author:
    Julio Leite

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes the connection.
      <I extends XmlObjectModelling>
      I      		 getResponse(java.lang.Class<I> responseClass, XmlObjectModelling request)
      Sends request to server and waits for response casted to responseClass.

      Remember that you can release the request and response as soon as became garbage.
      boolean isConnected()
      Returns the connection state.

    • Method Detail

      • getResponse

        <I extends XmlObjectModelling> I getResponse(java.lang.Class<I> responseClass,
                                             XmlObjectModelling request)
                                      throws ConnectionLtException
        Sends request to server and waits for response casted to responseClass.

        Remember that you can release the request and response as soon as became garbage.
        Parameters:
        responseClass - expected class from server
        request - to send to server
        Returns:
        response from server
        Throws:
        ConnectionLtException - if an exception was raised and is related with the connection, that exception should be put in the cause of the ConnectionLtException

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns the connection state.
        Returns:
        true if successfully connected

      • close

        void close()
    throws ConnectionLtException
        Closes the connection.
        Throws:
        ConnectionLtException - if an exception was raised and is related with the connection, that exception should be put in the cause of the ConnectionLtException
